text:
1/3

Blake Lively attends the Costume Institute Benefit at the Metropolitan Museum of Art on May 1. The actress shared photos from her birthday bash Sunday on Instagram. File Photo by John Angelillo/UPI | License Photo

Aug. 28 (UPI) -- Blake Lively rang in her 30th birthday at a "super sweet 16" party with friends. The actress shared photos from the bash Sunday featuring actress Anna Kendrick, jewelry designer Lorraine Schwartz and other pals. Advertisement

"My super sweet 16. ...but like 14 years late," she captioned a group picture on Instagram.

The snapshot shows Lively smiling with Kendrick, Schwartz and other friends around a dining room table. The group enjoyed two cakes -- a fruit-topped chocolate dessert and a smaller birthday cake.

My super sweet 16. ...but like 14 years late. A post shared by Blake Lively (@blakelively) on Aug 27, 2017 at 10:43am PDT Advertisement

Lively showed off her many gifts in another photo, including several bouquets of flowers and sweet treats like cookies and cupcakes.

"Thank you to everyone who sent me treats and made my day SO SPECIAL!!!! Love you all. And to my friends who didn't, you're dead to me," she joked.

Last gratuitous bday post: Thank you to everyone who sent me treats and made my day SO SPECIAL!!! Love you all. And to all my friends who didn't, you're dead to me. A post shared by Blake Lively (@blakelively) on Aug 27, 2017 at 6:39pm PDT

Lively officially celebrated her birthday Friday, Aug. 25. Her husband, actor Ryan Reynolds, marked the occasion by playfully teasing her on Instagram.

Advertisement

"Happy Birthday to my amazing wife," he captioned a photo of himself with Lively with most of the actress' face and body cropped out.

Lively will co-star with Kendrick in the upcoming movie A Simple Favor.
title: Blake Lively celebrates 30th birthday at 'super sweet 16' party
